sentence.Network_en: I inadvertently pressed the wrong button.
We had inadvertently left without paying the bill.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们无意之中未付账就离开了。

sentence.Network_en: I inadvertently passed this essay by.
sentence.Network_cn: 我漫不经心地把这篇散文忽略过去了.

entry.tran: 无意的;并非故意的;因疏忽造成的
entry.def: An inadvertent action is one that you do without realizing what you are doing.

example.ex: The government has said it was an inadvertent error.
example.tran: 政府声称那是因疏忽造成的过失。
